versos: (places) 2 Samuel 22:20 - "He brought me out into a spacious place; he rescued me because he delighted in me.";;;
(works) James 2:24 - "You see that a person is considered righteous by what they do and not by faith alone.";;;
(weary) Isaiah 40:31 - "but those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.";;;
(perfect) Matthew 5:48 - "Be perfect, therefore, as your heavenly Father is perfect.";;;
(talk) Proverbs 15:28 - "The heart of the righteous ponders how to answer, but the mouth of the wicked pours out evil things.";;;
(olive) Isaiah 17:6 - "Yet gleanings will be left in it like the shaking of an olive tree, two or three olives at the very top, four or five on the branches of a fruitful tree,";;;
(bow) Genesis 9:13 - I have set my rainbow in the clouds
(obadiah) The book of obadiah contains only one chapter with 21 verses, therefore the word "obadiah" appears in the book's title obadiah 1:1.;;;
(figs) Jeremiah 24:2 - "One basket had very good figs, like those that ripen early; and the other basket had very bad figs, so bad that they could not be eaten.";;;
(bread) John 6:35 - "Then Jesus declared, 'I am the bread of life. Whoever comes to me will never go hungry, and whoever believes in me will never be thirsty.'";;;
(pot) 2 Chronicles 35:13 - "They roasted the Passover animals over the fire as prescribed, and boiled the holy offerings in pots, caldrons and pans and served them quickly to all the people.";;;
(oil) Psalm 23:5 - "You prepare a table before me in the presence of my enemies; you anoint my head with oil; my cup overflows.";;;
(sweet) Proverbs 24:13 - "Eat honey, my son, for it is good; honey from the comb is sweet to your taste.";;;
(goodly) Psalm 48:2 - "Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth, is mount Zion, on the sides of the north, the city of the great King.";;;
(abhorred) Psalm 106:40 - Therefore the Lord was angry with his people and abhorred his inheritance.;;;
(hanging) Esther 2:23 - And when an inquiry was made into the matter
(turned) Psalm 126:1 - When the Lord turned again the captivity of Zion
